text: 17.12-13: Wkp 13.4617.12-13: Wkp 13.45-46Ana ndav vov ŋgu mbigen him, phɨkthɨgi gumgi, mbe ŋkari gu fari goreri rɨmrɨm ki, mbe zav maam anan purigi. Mbe zav maam anan purav, mbe vhɨra rɨmrɨm mbatɨk kav, mbe maaŋ muuŋgiap samra thivgiap, kama bakɨmera rugap, ana kaav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Zisas, Guman Rum, ndu nzan korar muuŋv nzan kura!”
